{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Pervases' Temple|It|Pervases' Temple}} is a temple dedicated to the deceased [[Yaksha]], [[Pervases]], and contains a statue dedicated to him. It originally appears as a dilapidated house, before being restored upon the completion of the {{Quest|Hereafter: All is Well}}.</p>}}

==NPCs==
* [[Wang Ping'an]] (after completing ''[[Hereafter: Return to the Mountains]]'')

==Interactables==
===Offer Incense===
After completing ''Hereafter: Return to the Mountains'', [[Fine Incense]] can be obtained by speaking to Wang Ping'an and offered to the statue of Pervases.
